build.cmd: mkdir -p /var/log/nginx /var/cache/nginx /run/nginx && echo 'server { listen 0.0.0.0:$PORT; root /app/frontend/inicio; index index.php; access_log /var/log/nginx/access.log; error_log /var/log/nginx/error.log; location / { try_files $uri $uri/ /index.php?$args; } location ~ \.php$ { include fastcgi_params; fastcgi_pass 127.0.0.1:9000; fastcgi_index index.php; fastcgi_param SCRIPT_FILENAME $document_root$fastcgi_script_name; } }' > /etc/nginx/nginx.conf && echo '[global] daemonize = no [www] listen = 127.0.0.1:9000' > /etc/php-fpm.d/www.conf
